TopicTitle: The most used words on the forum!

Articles.Content:
This picture describes the most frequently used words on the forum. The bigger they are, the more they're used

Edit 2:Since the forum now has RSS feeds, the program takes all the RSS feeds and finds the most commonly used words, then removes the most common. If it didn't the whole thing would be a giant "I".

Edited May 3, 2013 by Hocki
Fixed picture.

This is interesting "Mantis" :S

Love how PROBLEM is the most used :L Also surprised to not see multiplier somewhere there
I thought docking would be on there, and it's a bit disconcerting that problem is so big, it's like it's trolling us!

I thought that Mechjeb would be written across it.

No wait. Multiplayer. 2200 threads.
Realized this graph only shows the most popular words after the RSS feed was introduced, which was like 5 hours ago... Should I update it?

This look so nice

You should update it, if you can
I should probably wait a couple of days, and wait for the forum to run normally, and therefore give better statistics...
I find it amusing that the word "idiot" is on that list.

Yeah i do too, i've never seen anyone say Idiot on here.

Nevermind...
Oh by the way, the middle of some letters are transparent, you might want to change this

Yeah i do too, i've never seen anyone say Idiot on here.

It's most common use case is probably in the phrase "I'm an idiot"

Also, this completely misses the words most used together on this forum: "I'm not a programmer, but..."

Oh by the way, the middle of some letters are transparent, you might want to change this

What do you mean?
Sorry, I meant to write "Are not transparent", and by the middle of a letter, I speak of the two little bubbles in B, for example. They are white, instead of transparent
Yeah, I know,Wouldn't take long to fix, I'll put up a new one in about 16 hours. It's 3am here in Norway
